__e: I have a man on the inside who fed us the location.
We don't have an informant who takes us anywhere above the street.
Or from a Cl... who claimed to know him way back when.
But we got a CI next to him, and when he jumps dirty, we'll know.
I will say that we had an asset taken by that group and it was six weeks before they killed him.
Who told them? You've got an informer in your office, haven't you?
She had street informants, and she'd connected our project to the trouble--
Besides, without Quinn,you would have no C.I. And I'd be drinking alone.
I told him about the informant, that you'd be seeing him at 8:00.
You will have one hour to recruit an informant.
As you can see, not all informers are late.
